# TrajectoryComponents { #moodswing.TrajectoryComponents }

```python
TrajectoryComponents(raw, rolling, dct)
```

Container holding raw and smoothed signals.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name    | Type                  | Description                                                  | Default    |
|---------|-----------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| raw     | numpy.ndarray         | Base sentiment signal (typically per sentence or paragraph). | _required_ |
| rolling | numpy.ndarray \| None | Optional rolling-average smoothing of ``raw``.               | _required_ |
| dct     | numpy.ndarray \| None | Optional discrete cosine transform smoothing of ``raw``.     | _required_ |
